page.title: 02GURNARD BEACH.
page.content: The village is by the sea, it has a very long beach that stretches from Cowes past Gurnard cliff to Rew Street.The beach is stony and a bit seaweedy but it is a nice beach and lots of people go there in the summer. There is a beach shop on the marsh right by the sea. There is also a green by the sea that is good to sun bathe and play on. Quite a few holiday makers come to Gurnard in the summer time.Mostly they stay in the holiday camps or the beach chalets. Further west is Thorness and on the beach near Thorness Bay there are some holiday chalets.People live there during the summer. Gurnard is a good place to sail small boats and it has a sailing club.
